casebody.data:
James Hennessey, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 2, 1891. Appeal by the defendants from a judgment entered upon a decision after a trial at an equity term. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Leo C. Dessar, for respondent.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
